tool_description: Selfhost a whin instance, a Whatsapp API REST client.
name: mywhin
title: mywhin

api_list.name: post receiver
api_list.description: This endpoint shall be triggered by origin services, it's **NOT** to be used on the playground.

api_list.name: create group
api_list.description: creates a new group. This [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDM_l33691M) shows a how-to.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/grpnew"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/grpnew"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: set webhook url
api_list.description: use this endpoint to specify the valid URL to which you want the system to deliver the whatsapp messages you receive. This [video](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HDM_l33691M) shows an example.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/seturl"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: send message
api_list.description: Sends a whatsapp message to a whatsapp contact; the payload must contain the right schema.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/wspout"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: demote group members
api_list.description: Demote members of a group. Make sure you are Admin of the group, before using this endpoint.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/grpdem"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: promote group members
api_list.description: promotes members to Admin of a group. Make sure you are an Admin of the group before using this endpoint.

        }

print(response.json())

api_list.name: remove group members
api_list.description: removes members from a group; make sure you're Admin of the group before using this endpoint.

api_list.name: add group members
api_list.description: adds a new member to a group; make sure you are Admin of the group, before using this endpoint.

api_list.name: send message to group
api_list.description: The requests to this endpoint will be messages sent to a whatsapp group.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mywhin.p.rapidapi.com/send2grp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mywhin.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
